annoyingFriendsText: Got snowball'd <%= count %> times by crewmates.
alarmingFriendsText: Got spook'd <%= count %> times by crewmates.
agriculturalFriendsText: Got transform'd into a flower <%= count %> times by crew mates.
aquaticFriendsText: Got splash'd <%= count %> times by crew mates.
valentineCardExplanation: For endurin' such a saccharine poem, ye both receive th' "Adorin' Friends" badge!
valentineCardNotes: Send a Valentine's Day card to a crew mate.
valentine0:
"Roses be red

Me Dailies be blue

'Tis happy I be 

T'a be in yer Crew!"
valentine1:
"Roses be red

Violets be nice

Let's get togeth'r

An' fight against Vice!"
valentine2:
"Roses be red

This poem style be old

I hope that ye like this

'Cause it cost ten Gold."
valentine3:
"Roses be red

Some Drakes be icy

No treasure be better

Than time spent wit' ye!"
valentineCardAchievementText: Aww, ye an' yer heartie must really care about each other! Sent or receiv'd <%= count %> Valentine's Day cards.
seasonalShopClosedText: Th' Seas'nal Shop be currently closed!! 'tis only open durin' Habitica's four Grand Galas.
seasonalShopSummerText: Happy Summer Splash!! Would ye like to buy some rare items? They’ll only be available until July 31st!
seasonalShopFallText: Happy Fall Festival!! Would ye like to buy some rare items? They’ll only be available until October 31st!
seasonalShopWinterText: Happy Winter Wonderland!! Would ye like to buy some rare items? They’ll only be available until January 31st!
seasonalShopSpringText: Happy Spring Fling!! Would ye like to buy some rare items? They’ll only be available until April 30th!
seasonalShopFallTextBroken: Oh.... Welcome t' th' Seas'nal Shop... We be stockin' autumn Seas'nal Edition goodies, 'r somethin'... Everythin' here will be available t' purchase durin' th' Fall Festival event each year, but we only be open 'til October 31... I guess ye should be stockin' up now, or ye'll be havin' t' wait... an' wait... an' wait... *sigh*
seasonalShopBrokenText: My pavilion!!!!!!! My decorations!!!! Oh, th' Dysheartener's destroy'd everythin' :( Please help defeat it in th' Tavern so I can rebuild!
seasonalShopRebirth: If ye bought any o' this equipment in th' past but don't currently own it, ye can repurchase it in th' Rewards Column. Fer starters, ye'll only be able t' purchase th' items fer yer current class (Swashbuckler by default), but fear not, th' other class-specific items'll become available if ye switch t' that class.
nyeCardExplanation: Fer celebratin' th' new year together, ye both receive th' "Auld Acquaintance" badge!
nyeCardNotes: Send a New Year's card t' a crewmate.
nyeCardAchievementText: Happy New Year! Sent or received <%= count %> New Year's cards.
nye0: Happy New Year! May ye slay many a bad Habit.
nye1: Happy New Year! May ye reap many Rewards.
nye2: Happy New Year! May ye earn many a Perfect Day.
nye3: Happy New Year! May yer T' Do list stay short an' sweet.
nye4: Happy New Year! May ye not get attacked by a ragin' Hippogriff.
winterPromoGiftHeader: GIFT A SUBSCR'PTION, GET ONE FREE!
winterPromoGiftDetails1: Until January 6th only, when ye gift somebody a subscr'ption, ye git th' same subscr'ption fer yerself fer free!
winterPromoGiftDetails2: Please note that if ye or yer gift recipient already 'ave a recurrin' subscr'ption, th' gift'd subscr'ption will only start after that subscr'ption be cancell'd or has expir'd. Thanks so much fer yer support! <3
g1g1Announcement: Gift a subscr'ption an' get a subscr'ption free event goin' on now!
g1g1Details: Gift a subscr'ption t' a friend, an' ye'll receive th' same subscr'ption fer free!
eventAvailabilityReturning: Available fer purchase 'til <%= availableDate(locale) %>. This potion was last fer sale in <%= previousDate(locale) %>.
g1g1HowItWorks: Type in th' username o' th' account ye’d like t' gift to. From there, pick th' sub length ye’d like t' gift an' check out. Yer account will automatic'lly be reward'd wit' th' same level o' subscr'ption ye just gift'd.
g1g1Returning: In honor o' th' seas'n, we’re bringin' back a very special promotion. Now when ye gift a subscr'ption, ye’ll receive th' same in return!
g1g1Event: Gift One, Git One event goin' on now!
g1g1Limitations: This be a limit'd time event that starts on Decemb'r 17th at 8:00 AM ET (13:00 UTC) an' will end January 7th at 8:00 PM ET (1:00 UTC). This promotion only applies when ye gift t' anoth'r Habitican. If ye or yer gift recipient already 'ave a subscr'ption, th' gift'd subscr'ption will add months o' credit that will only be used after th' current subscr'ption be canceled or expires.
